history.content:
Check out the Details Here: https://www.meetup.com/ucberkeley_cloudmeetup/events/269258821/

 

The UC Berkeley Cloud Community of Practice will be holding our 12th meetup, in an all-virtual mode. The meetup planning group decided that given preparations for resilience in the face of COVID-19/coronavirus, we would hold the meeting remotely AND feature speakers who are working using technology to enable virtual events and courses. We have some excellent guests and topics and hope to see you (cameras on!) later this month. Sorry we do not know how to deliver 🍕🍕🍕🥤 remotely!

Everyone is welcome - this is a really inclusive group! You don't have to be an expert, or already know about cloud technologies; we get together so people can learn from each other.

HOW TO CONNECT VIA ZOOM:

Join Zoom Meeting
https://berkeley.zoom.us/j/185863585

Find your local number: https://berkeley.zoom.us/u/adbovUyBgE
history.subject: [Virtual Event] UC Berkeley Cloud Meetup 012
